
```{r data-cul-assign-variable}
if (!exists("params")) {
    stop("This template must be rendered via knit_child() with params supplied.")
}
cultivars <- params$cultivars
```


## Cultivars



```{r list-cultivar}
tbl <- cultivars |> 
    dplyr::mutate(Cultivar = paste0(
        "<a href='", "cultivar/", Cultivar, ".html", "'>",
        Cultivar,
        "</a>"
    ))

DT::datatable(
    tbl,
    escape = FALSE,
    rownames = FALSE,
    options = list(
        pageLength = 10,
        lengthMenu = c(10, 25, 50, 100),
        order = list(list(0, "asc"))
    )
)
```
